mapper.select: SELECT i.no, d.dong, d.aptname, d.code, i.buildyear, i.jibun, i.lat, i.lng, d.dealamount, d.area FROM housedeal as d, houseinfo as i WHERE d.aptname = i.aptname AND d.dong LIKE ${dong};

SELECT i.no, d.dong, d.aptname, d.code, i.buildyear, i.jibun, i.lat, i.lng, d.dealamount, d.area FROM housedeal as d, houseinfo as i WHERE d.aptname = i.aptname AND d.aptname LIKE CONCAT('%', ${aptname}, '%')
